code: function Paginator(items,actual_page,itens_per_page){var page=actual_page||1;var per_page=itens_per_page||5;var offset=(page-1)*per_page;var paginatedItems=items.slice(offset).slice(0,per_page);var total_pages=Math.ceil(items.length/per_page);return{page:page,per_page:per_page,pre_page:page-1?page-1:null,next_page:total_pages>page?page+1:null,total:items.length,total_pages:total_pages,data:paginatedItems};}export default Paginator;
